title: Locksmith licenses
dataVerified: Licensee name, business name, license number, bonding, issuing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake locksmith licenses. Domain binding verifies state licensing board. Consumer protection (prevents locksmith scams). Bonding verification. Key control compliance.
